import { useState , useContext } from 'react'; import { JobContext } from '../context/JobContext' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import '../css/JobForm.css' function JobForm() { const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const { createJob } = useContext(JobContext) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); createJob({ title, description }); setTitle(""); setDescription(""); }; return (

Why us

Proof of quality

No cost until you hire

Safe and secure

Upload a job

Job Title setTitle(e.target.value)} value={title} autoFocus /> Job Description setDescription(e.target.value)} value={description} />
); } export default JobForm;
